title.en: What's the point of...? (¿De qué sirve...?)
title.es: What's the point of...? (¿De qué sirve...?)

description.en: Learn how to question the usefulness or purpose of something using 'What's the point of...?' with gerunds.
description.es: Aprende a cuestionar la utilidad o propósito de algo usando 'What's the point of...?' con gerundios.

prompt.en: What's the point of getting up early if it makes you feel sleepy later in the day?
prompt.es: ¿De qué sirve levantarte temprano si luego te entra sueño?

exercises.solution: What's the point of getting up early if it makes you feel sleepy later in the day?

tip.en: Remember that after the preposition 'of' we need a verb in the gerund form (-ing). This expression is used to question the usefulness or purpose of something.
tip.es: No olvides que después de la preposición 'of' hace falta un verbo en gerundio (-ing). Esta expresión se usa para cuestionar la utilidad o propósito de algo.
